name: dev-setup
description: This project follows Semantic Versioning. Versions are managed automatically based on commit messages. ### Commit Message Convention - feat: New feature - fix: Bug fix - docs: Documentation changes - style: Code formatting - refactor: Code refactoring - test: Adding or modifying tests - chore: Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools   For more details, please refer to [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md).
